name: Template: Notify Access Request Decided
description: A five-step workflow that emails two identities when an access request is approved or denied.

Get Identity.description: Get the identity data for the identity that the access was requested for.  This will be used to lookup the identity's manager.

Get Identity 1.description: This node is used to gather information about the user's manager to populate their email.

attributes.body:
Dear ${manager},

This email is to inform you that your direct report ${directReport}, has requested access with ID${requestID}. This request has a status of:
${status}.


Thank you,
Your Access Team
attributes.subject: Your employee has an update to their access

Send Email.description: Send an email to the identity's manager to notify them of the access change.

attributes.body:
Dear ${IdName},

This email is to inform you that your access request with ID ${accessR} has been determined with the following status
${requestStatus}.


Thank you,
Your Access Team
attributes.subject: Your access has been decided

Send Email 2.description: Send an email to the identity that is the target of the access request with the details of the decision.
